Terms of Service
longText:
SDC is an open-source program provided by the website owner for educational and presentation use. The service is freely available.

The service is provided as is. Users are responsible for the copyrights of the materials they handle with the service and for ensuring their use of the service is lawful.
haltPromptInfoText: The use of this service has been halted, because the Terms of Service were rejected. If you want to use the service, please refresh the page and accept the Terms of Service.
